trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_SEQ_00<tab>Aeluuin would ask you to make a special delivery.
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_SEQ_01<tab>Aeluuin has entrusted you with delivering meals to three prospectors at Finders' Bluff: Laughing Fury, Vavapu, and Ademar.
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_SEQ_02<tab>The three prospectors were overjoyed to receive their long-awaited meals. Inform Aeluuin that they go hungry no more.
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_SEQ_03<tab>Aeluuin is genuinely pleased to hear that the prospectors at Finders' Bluff enjoyed their meals. It is clear that the innkeep cares deeply for his customers.

TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_AELUUIN_000_000<tab>My <var 08 E905 ((dear lady)) ((good man)) /var>, I daresay you're more reliable than the rest of my hired help put together. For better or for worse, this means I've got another job for you.

TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_AELUUIN_000_001<tab>I've got three basket lunches here that need delivering to Finders' Bluff. After the last adventurer scarfed down three boxes on his own and ran off without paying his tab, I need someone I can trust.

TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_LAUGHINGFURY_000_010<tab>Diggin' for gold day and night sure works me up an appetite. Is it time for <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((supper)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((supper)) /var>)) /var> yet?
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_LAUGHINGFURY_000_015<tab>One o' Master Aeluuin's specialty basket lunches? Well, now, don't mind if I do!
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_VAVAPU_000_030<tab>Ah! Will my tummy not stop rumbling? Tummy! I command you! Cease your rumbling!
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_VAVAPU_000_035<tab>From Aeluuin, you say? My tummy and I are much obliged!
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_ADEMAR_000_050<tab>Bloody hog of an adventurer, stealin' the food o' honest, hardworkin' men...
TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_ADEMAR_000_055<tab>Are me eyes to be believed!? Thank ye, friend. It's good to know <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> adventurers can still be trusted.

TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_AELUUIN_000_070<tab>Aeluuin's famous basket lunches hit the spot, eh? I thought as much! The prospectors at Finders' Bluff aren't just digging for personal fortune, you know─each onze of gold helps this region thrive and prosper. I'm happy to return the favor.

TEXT_GAIUSA901_00796_AELUUIN_000_071<tab>You've gone above and beyond for me, and for this you have my thanks. Next time you fancy an ale, a tale, or just a respite from the road, know that there's always a place for you here at the Bobbing Cork.
